name: Integro
description:
Modern Solutions for Information Governance & Content Services
Founded in 1995, Integro is an award-winning technical consultancy helping enterprises confront the evolving content landscape with modern solutions for information governance and content services. Integro’s proven framework drives down risk and improves operational efficiency by helping companies understand, enrich, and leverage diverse content types across the enterprise.
We’re proud to be named a Global Leader and Top ECM Consultant by research firm, Clutch; a “Cool Vendor” by analyst firm, Gartner; and a Worldwide Governance award-winner by IBM.
